about_the_game:
Saturday Super Day is a point and click exploratory choose your own adventure game that was prototyped in PowerPoint.
You play as Bobbi who wakes on a mid 90s Saturday morning with a mission: To reach the computer lab at Scuttlebutt High School and back up an important project before the school servers get wiped for the summer.

Embark on a lovingly handcrafted journey through Olympia WA. That's been packed to the brim with explorable content and characters.

Features:
  • A vast, mid 90s accurate world to enjoy at your own pace.
  • Over 30 different environments to explore.
  • Unique hand-drawn art style based on 90s animation.
  • Intuitive drag and drop controls.

Saturday Super Day is a point and click exploratory choose your own adventure game that was prototyped in PowerPoint.
You play as Bobbi who wakes on a mid 90s Saturday morning with a mission: To reach the computer lab at Scuttlebutt High School and back up an important project before the school servers get wiped for the summer.

Embark on a lovingly handcrafted journey through Olympia WA. That's been packed to the brim with explorable content and characters.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor (Apple Silicon & Intel supported)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15+
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor (Apple Silicon & Intel supported)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal or OpenGL 3
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Saturday Super Day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM

Play as Bobbi who wakes on a mid 90s Saturday morning with a mission: Reach the computer lab at and back up an important project before the servers get wiped for the summer.
